Vernis Shape Showerpipe 230 1jet Reno

Why this product is special

With Vernis, you can design your entire bathroom at a great price. Whether round or square – make it your style with timeless modern taps and showers and add accents to your bathroom.

The Push shower slide can be easily adjusted to the desired height with just one hand.

Limescale deposits and dirt can simply be rubbed off with your finger. For minimal cleaning effort.

The angular, geometric shape will delight fans of minimalist, no-frills design.

The geometric design of Vernis Shape stands for a visually striking look throughout the bathroom.

Product Line Vernis Shape

The striking design is reflected in the angular handle with a flat surface. Pictured here in the variant with CoolStart technology.

Product Line Vernis Shape

The stylish Vernis Shape design suits a streamlined design. Three heights are available on the sink.

Product Line Vernis Shape

Vernis Shape completes the entire bathroom. The shower faucet matches the faucets on the sink and bath tub.

Product Line Vernis Shape

The Vernis Shape design, with its precise edges, extends to the rectangular overhead shower.

Product Line Vernis Shape

Vernis Shape shower faucet with angular handle and shower connection continues the geometric style on the bath tub.

Product Line Vernis Shape

Innovative technologies

Less limescale, more joy

Who actually likes cleaning? Limescale deposits and dirt disappear in an instant with this technology. Simply rub the flexible silicone discs or nozzles with a finger. It’s fast and keeps cleaning to a minimum.

Great showering pleasure

XXL showering indulgence that envelops the complete body in real-life dreams of water using wonderfully soothing spray types from hand showers and overhead showers with diameters of 100 to 600 mm.

Less limescale, more joy

Less limescale, more joy

Who actually likes cleaning? Limescale deposits and dirt disappear in an instant with this technology. Simply rub the flexible silicone discs or nozzles with a finger. It’s fast and keeps cleaning to a minimum.

Great showering pleasure

Great showering pleasure

XXL showering indulgence that envelops the complete body in real-life dreams of water using wonderfully soothing spray types from hand showers and overhead showers with diameters of 100 to 600 mm.

Invigorating and energising everyday showering indulgence with a satisfyingly full shower rain. With its small outlets on the shower head, this spray type works efficiently to thoroughly rinse out shampoo.

Stimulating water sprays that wash away tiredness and immediately make the person feel nice and awake. The perfect and quick way to feel fit for the day ahead. The powerful spray also effortlessly rinses shampoo out of hair.

Rain

Invigorating and energising everyday showering indulgence with a satisfyingly full shower rain. With its small outlets on the shower head, this spray type works efficiently to thoroughly rinse out shampoo.

IntenseRain

Stimulating water sprays that wash away tiredness and immediately make the person feel nice and awake. The perfect and quick way to feel fit for the day ahead. The powerful spray also effortlessly rinses shampoo out of hair.

Our promise

We are at your side in the real and digital worlds when it comes to assistance, service, and guarantees.

Our Guarantee Services

In addition to the voluntary manufacturer’s guarantee, you can trust the multiple awards given for the high quality standards and durability of hansgrohe products.

Our Green Heart

Water is life, and our passion. Our sustainable product solutions combine water- and energy-efficient technologies and take responsibility for people, the environment, and our planet.

Our Service for You

Whatever you have in mind, we are here to help and support you when it comes to assistance, service, guarantees, or spare parts. Feel free to contact us.

Trust in highest quality

Five-year manufacturer's guarantee

Offering our customers the highest quality at all times is a fundamental part of the Hansgrohe company philosophy.

Article features

consists of: overhead shower, hand shower, shower hose, slider

overhead shower Vernis Shape 230 1jet

shower head size overhead shower: 230 x 170 mm

spray type overhead shower: Rain

flow rate Rain spray at 3 bar: 12,4 l/min

spray type hand shower: Rain, IntenseRain

flow rate of hand shower at 3 bar: 15,2 l/min

maximum flow rate for Showerpipe at 3 bar: 15,2 l/min

minimum flow pressure: 1 bar

max. operating pressure: 10 bar

ball-joint: overhead shower angle adjustable

mounting type: exposed installation

shower bar diameter: 19 mm

height-adjustable slider with locking push-button slider

shower arm length: 400 mm

water connection: Metaflex shower hose 80 cm and 160 cm

connection dimension: DN15

connection thread: G ½

suitable for continuous flow water heaters
